description: This whole game is great, the story is a very nice one, i will replay the game because it was amazing, there are no words to describe, i recommend it.

I like the style of the game and it has a neat story but the game has you "reply" to messages from people and send PM without seeing what you sent. It feels like I'm missing half the story and kinda ruins things.
summary: Interisting game but lacking a bit

description: A game I think everyone should play at least once. My second time playing and I will never get over how much I love it. Digital: A Love Story walked so Emily Is Away could run.
summary: My favorite game of all time

description: Love the Amiga reference, a true nostalgia hit !
